channel.title: 317 Delta NEED HELP HOW TO ADD BARRICADES!
channel.description:
Sorry guys I really need to know how to add these I have delta 317
I need to make them be able to
-to be placed and no one could walk through -You can kill it -you can set it up
Thanks Sorry Couldnt find any tutorials
:)

item.title: 317 Delta NEED HELP HOW TO ADD BARRICADES!
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

When your players path is generated… make sure it locates the barricade. Look at how trees and other things are done.
When you click to setup the barricade register the object to the world?
Give the barricade some hp and allow players to attack it.

Well that’s a good start. Maybe if you post some code we could help you more

Read full topic
